entities.name: Cricket.flf
observations: A figlet font with a playful, rounded style. Good for fun or less formal section headers.

entities.name: Crawford2.flf
observations: A figlet font with a bold, geometric look. Suitable for strong, attention-grabbing headers.

entities.name: ANSI Regular.flf
observations: A figlet font with a blocky, digital style. Good for technical or status screens.

entities.name: ANSI Shadow.flf
observations: A figlet font with a shadowed, 3D effect. Useful for dramatic or highlighted sections.

entities.name: miniwi.flf
observations: A figlet font with a compact, minimalist style. Ideal for small headers or side-by-side art.

entities.name: Poison.flf
observations: A figlet font with a dripping, stylized effect. Great for warnings, errors, or 'danger' sections.

entities.name: Stick Letters.flf
observations: A figlet font with a stick-figure, outlined look. Good for playful or schematic headers.
